languages.text: "Однако династия Чорда имеет свои интересы на Футфоле. Мы уже озвучили условия сделки Наместнику Владайму, но он тянет время — видимо, рассчитывая получить более выгодное предложение от вас. Династия Чорда считает..." {n}Бастьян улыбается и слегка разводит руками.{/n} "...считает, что двум домам Вольных Торговцев лучше действовать сообща. Если вы откажете Владайму, толкнув его заключить сделку с нами — династия Чорда может пообещать вам долю от прибыли от будущего контракта, и некоторые другие блага. Все — к всеобщей выгоде!"

traits.locale_text: "Однако династия Чорда имеет свои интересы на Футфоле. Мы уже озвучили условия сделки наместнику Владайму, но он тянет время — видимо, рассчитывая получить более выгодное предложение от вас. Династия Чорда считает..." {n}Бастьян улыбается и слегка разводит руками.{/n} "...считает, что двум домам Вольных Торговцев лучше действовать сообща. Если вы откажете Владайму, толкнув его заключить сделку с нами — династия Чорда может пообещать вам долю от прибыли от будущего контракта, и некоторые другие блага. Все — к всеобщей выгоде!"

languages.text: "However, the Chorda dynasty pursues its own interests on Footfall. We have already announced our terms to the Liege, but he is stalling — I imagine, in hopes of getting a better offer from you. The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other perquisites. Everybody benefits!"
languages.original_text: "Однако династия Чорда имеет свои интересы на Футфоле. Мы уже озвучили условия сделки Наместнику Владайму, но он тянет время — видимо, рассчитывая получить более выгодное предложение от вас. traits.locale_text: "However, the Chorda dynasty pursues its own interests on Footfall. We have already announced our terms to Liege Vladaym, but he is stalling — I imagine, in hopes of getting a better offer from you. The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other bonuses. All for mutual benefit!"

The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other perquisites. Everybody benefits!"

languages.text: 「しかし、コーダ王朝はフットフォールで独自の利益を追求しています。すでにリージュには我々の条件を伝えてありますが、彼は決断を引き延ばしています――あなたがより良い条件を提示されるのを期待しているのでしょう。コーダ王朝としては…」{n}バスティアンは笑い、軽く肩をすくめた。{/n}「…自由開拓者の両家にとって、協力するのが望ましいと思っています。あなたがヴラダイムを拒否し、我々との取引に応じていただければ…コーダ王朝は、将来的な契約から得られる利益の分配と、その他の優遇を約束いたします。お互いに得する話でしょう！」
languages.original_text: "However, the Chorda dynasty pursues its own interests on Footfall. We have already announced our terms to the Liege, but he is stalling — I imagine, in hopes of getting a better offer from you. The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other perquisites. Everybody benefits!"

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、コーダ王朝はフットフォールで独自の利益を追求しています。すでにリージュには我々の条件を伝えてありますが、彼は決断を引き延ばしています――あなたがより良い条件を提示されるのを期待しているのでしょう。コーダ王朝としては…」{n}バスティアンは笑い、軽く肩をすくめた。{/n}「…自由開拓者の両家にとって、協力するのが望ましいと思っています。あなたがヴラダイムを拒否し、我々との取引に応じていただければ…コーダ王朝は、将来的な契約から得られる利益の分配と、その他の優遇を約束いたします。お互いに得する話でしょう！」

languages.text: “然而，库尔达王朝也打算在落脚港争取利益。我们已经告知总督我们的条件，但他仍然在拖延时间。我猜，他应该是希望从您那里得到更好的条件。库尔达王朝坚信……”{n}巴斯蒂安微笑着耸耸肩。{/n}“……如果我们之间可以彼此合作，这对两个行商浪人王朝而言都是更好的选择。如果您能拒绝弗拉迪姆的提议，逼迫他与我们达成协议，库尔达王朝承诺会让您从未来的合约中得到一部分利润，还愿意提供额外的报酬。这是个双赢的结果！”
languages.original_text: "However, the Chorda dynasty pursues its own interests on Footfall. We have already announced our terms to the Liege, but he is stalling — I imagine, in hopes of getting a better offer from you. The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other perquisites. Everybody benefits!"

traits.locale_text: “然而，库尔达王朝也打算在落脚港争取利益。我们已经告知总督我们的条件，但他仍然在拖延时间。我猜，他应该是希望从您那里得到更好的条件。库尔达王朝坚信……”{n}巴斯蒂安微笑着耸耸肩。{/n}“……如果我们之间可以彼此合作，这对两个行商浪人王朝而言都是更好的选择。如果您能拒绝弗拉迪姆的提议，逼迫他与我们达成协议，库尔达王朝承诺会让您从未来的合约中得到一部分利润，还愿意提供额外的报酬。这是个双赢的结果！”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, la dinastía Chorda tiene sus propios intereses en Paso. Le hemos presentado nuestras condiciones al Señor, pero nos da largas. Me imagino que porque esperará que usted le ofrezca algo mejor. La dinastía Chorda piensa...» {n}Bastian sonríe y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «... que lo mejor sería que cooperaran ambas casas de Comerciantes Independientes. Si rechaza a Vladaym y no le queda otra que cerrar un trato con nosotros, la dinastía Chorda le prometerá una parte de los beneficios del futuro contrato, además de ciertos privilegios más. ¡Todo el mundo sale ganando!».
languages.original_text: "However, the Chorda dynasty pursues its own interests on Footfall. We have already announced our terms to the Liege, but he is stalling — I imagine, in hopes of getting a better offer from you. The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other perquisites. Everybody benefits!"

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, la dinastía Chorda tiene sus propios intereses en Paso. Le hemos presentado nuestras condiciones al Señor, pero nos da largas. Me imagino que porque esperará que usted le ofrezca algo mejor. La dinastía Chorda piensa...» {n}Bastian sonríe y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «... que lo mejor sería que cooperaran ambas casas de Comerciantes Independientes. Si rechaza a Vladaym y no le queda otra que cerrar un trato con nosotros, la dinastía Chorda le prometerá una parte de los beneficios del futuro contrato, además de ciertos privilegios más. ¡Todo el mundo sale ganando!».

languages.text: « Cependant, la dynastie Chorda souhaite protéger ses intérêts à Castel. Nous avons déjà proposé un accord au suzerain, mais il ne semble pas pressé de nous donner une réponse. J'imagine qu'il attend une meilleure offre de votre part. La dynastie Chorda a bien réfléchi... » {n}Bastian hausse légèrement les épaules et continue en souriant.{/n} « Elle pense qu'une collaboration serait préférable pour nos deux maisons de libres-marchands. Si vous refusez de conclure un marché avec Vladaym, le contraignant donc à commercer avec nous, la dynastie Chorda s'assurera de vous reverser une partie de ses profits, ainsi que d'autres gratifications. Tout le monde pourrait être gagnant ! »
languages.original_text: "However, the Chorda dynasty pursues its own interests on Footfall. We have already announced our terms to the Liege, but he is stalling — I imagine, in hopes of getting a better offer from you. The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other perquisites. Everybody benefits!"

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, la dynastie Chorda souhaite protéger ses intérêts à Castel. Nous avons déjà proposé un accord au suzerain, mais il ne semble pas pressé de nous donner une réponse. J'imagine qu'il attend une meilleure offre de votre part. La dynastie Chorda a bien réfléchi... » {n}Bastian hausse légèrement les épaules et continue en souriant.{/n} « Elle pense qu'une collaboration serait préférable pour nos deux maisons de libres-marchands. Si vous refusez de conclure un marché avec Vladaym, le contraignant donc à commercer avec nous, la dynastie Chorda s'assurera de vous reverser une partie de ses profits, ainsi que d'autres gratifications. Tout le monde pourrait être gagnant ! »

languages.text: "Aber die Dynastie Chorda verfolgt auf Footfall eigene Interessen. Wir haben dem Lehnsherren unsere Konditionen bereits mitgeteilt, aber er verzögert die Sache – vermutlich in der Hoffnung, von Euch ein besseres Angebot zu erhalten. Die Dynastie Chorda glaubt ..." {n}Bastian lächelt und zuckt leicht mit den Schultern.{/n} "... dass eine Kooperation für beide Freihändlerhäuser von Vorteil wäre. Wenn Ihr Vladaym zurückweist und damit zwingt, einen Abschluss mit uns zu machen ... verspricht Euch die Dynastie Chorda einen Teil des Gewinns aus dem künftigen Vertrag sowie weitere Vergünstigungen. Alle hätten etwas davon!"
languages.original_text: "However, the Chorda dynasty pursues its own interests on Footfall. We have already announced our terms to the Liege, but he is stalling — I imagine, in hopes of getting a better offer from you. The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other perquisites. Everybody benefits!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber die Dynastie Chorda verfolgt auf Footfall eigene Interessen. Wir haben dem Lehnsherren unsere Konditionen bereits mitgeteilt, aber er verzögert die Sache – vermutlich in der Hoffnung, von Euch ein besseres Angebot zu erhalten. Die Dynastie Chorda glaubt ..." {n}Bastian lächelt und zuckt leicht mit den Schultern.{/n} "... dass eine Kooperation für beide Freihändlerhäuser von Vorteil wäre. Wenn Ihr Vladaym zurückweist und damit zwingt, einen Abschluss mit uns zu machen ... verspricht Euch die Dynastie Chorda einen Teil des Gewinns aus dem künftigen Vertrag sowie weitere Vergünstigungen. Alle hätten etwas davon!"

languages.text: "Lakin Chorda hanedanlığının Binliman'da kendi menfaatleri mevcut. Koşullarımızı hâlihazırda Emîr'e de bildirdik ancak ayak sürüyor. Büyük ihtimalle sizden daha iyi bir teklif beklediği için. Chorda hanedanlığı da..." {n}Bastian gülümseyerek hafifçe omuz silkiyor.{/n} "İş birliği yapmanın, iki Hür Tacir hanesinin de hayrına olacağına inanıyor. Vladaym'ı reddedip bizimle anlaşmaya zorlarsanız Chorda hanedanlığı, gelecek anlaşmalardan size de pay ayırmayı garanti eder. Elbette üstüne ekstra birtakım imtiyazlarınız olacak. Herkes kazançlı çıkacak!"
languages.original_text: "However, the Chorda dynasty pursues its own interests on Footfall. We have already announced our terms to the Liege, but he is stalling — I imagine, in hopes of getting a better offer from you. The Chorda dynasty believes..." {n}Bastian smiles and gives a slight shrug.{/n} "...that cooperation would be preferable for both Rogue Trader houses. If you refuse Vladaym, thereby forcing him to agree to a deal with us — the Chorda dynasty can promise you a share of the profits from the future contract, as well as certain other perquisites. Everybody benefits!"

traits.locale_text: "Her nasılsa… Chorda hanedanlığının, Binliman için başka planları var. Koşullarımızı hâlihazırda Emîr'e de bildirdik ancak ayak sürümeye devam ediyor. Sizden daha iyi bir teklif beklediği için olduğuna inanıyorum. Chorda hanedanlığı da…" {n}Bastian gülümseyerek hafifçe omuz silkiyor.{/n} "…iş birliği yapmanın, iki Hür Tacir hanesinin de hayrına olacağına inanıyor. Vladaym'ı reddedip bizimle anlaşmaya zorlarsanız Chorda hanedanlığı, gelecek anlaşmalardan payınıza düşeni alacağınızı garanti ediyor. Tabii ki tek kârınız bu da olmayacak. Herkesin kazançlı çıktığı bir senaryo bu!"
